noPermission.description_embed: You do not have permission to use this command!
noPermission.description_embed_no_features: The feature is currently disabled. An administrator needs to enable it for it to be usable.

levelsCommand.description_embed_delete: The configuration of the Levels System has been removed, the channel {0} has been deleted and will no longer receive notifications.
levelsCommand.description_embed: The Levels System has been configured and the channel {0} has been set, it will now receive level advancement notifications for various users.
levelsCommand.newLevel_embed: Congratulations {0}, you have leveled up now you are level {1}.
levelsCommand.description_embed_delrole: You have successfully removed role {0} and it will now no longer be set
levelsCommand.description_embed_addrole: You have successfully added the role {0} and it will now be set to members with level {1}
levelsCommand.description_embed_statsNotFound: The user has no statistics available yet, please try again later
